body_html: Taskset is independent of any internal pytorch mechanisms for setting the number of threads and can help debug that particular component. And you can also account for NUMA (if this is appropiate).

body: Taskset is independent of any internal pytorch mechanisms for setting the number of threads and can help debug that particular component. And you can also account for NUMA (if this is appropiate).
